```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| echo: true
#| out-width: 90%
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-cap: Queste sono le mie stats di TFT plottate
#| fig-cap-location: margin
#| label: TFTstats
#| code-line-numbers: "|2|3|4|5|6"
ggplot(mtcars,                                   
       aes(hp, mpg, color = factor(am))) +       
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(formula = y ~ x, method = "loess") +
  theme(legend.position = 'bottom')
```
